top of page Always fresh. Locally sourced. Ready-to-eat Shrimp Boil. What's Cooking Catered Lowcountry Shrimp Boil Lowcountry Royal Shrimp Boil Our signature dish is the classic Shrimp Boil, cooked to perfection with locally sourced shrimp, juicy smoked sausage, red and gold potatoes, and fresh corn on the cob. Kale and Collard Greens Taste our fresh kale and collard greens mix with shredded smoked turkey. See our menu Baked Mac and Cheese will become your family favorite. No meal is complete without Mac and Cheese. Our cheesy, creamy, dreamy version of this American classic About ​ We don’t skimp on the shrimp. We pack The Lowcountry’s signature dish with the main ingredient. Beach party? Family dinner? We've got you covered. Locally Sourced Ingredients We believe in using the freshest and locally sourced ingredients to ensure that you get a true Lowcountry experience. Convenient Ordering Ordering from Lowcountry Royal is simple and convenient. You can order online and pickup your food or have it delivered straight to your doorstep. bottom of page
